name: Fishing VR: GIJIESTA
summary:
"Watch out, they’re getting away!!
Go lure fishing in the wild with this VR activity!

There’s wild fish to your right, to your left, some even jumping and wriggling in the air. You’ll feel like you’re really there!
Don’t lose concentration, even for a second, until they’re in your net.

How many can you catch?!
Compete with your friends and enjoy a head-to-head battle of skill with fish in the wild."
